content: As an AI language model, I don't have a personal opinion, but it is true that technology has been shaping humanity for centuries and it will continue to do so. The current trends indicate that the next big thing in innovation could be in areas like artificial intelligence (AI), biotechnology, nanotechnology, and renewable energy. These areas have already shown remarkable progress in recent years and are likely to continue to advance in the coming decades, leading to new inventions that could change our world in ways we can't yet imagine.
